meanings.definition: Moving back and forth or from side to side
meanings.sent1: The swinging pendulum mesmerized the students in the physics class.
meanings.sent2: The swinging branches of the tree provided a soothing rhythm in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The swinging chandelier in the haunted house creaked eerily in the darkness.
meanings.sent4: The swinging boat on the stormy sea felt like a wild dance with the waves.
meanings.sent5: The swinging bridge across the river was both thrilling and nerve-wracking to cross.
